  16. (* Types of files involved in an OCaml project and related functions *)

  18. ‌type backend_specific = Object | Library | Program

  20. ‌type t =
  21.   | Implementation
  22.   | Interface
  23.   | C
  24.   | C_minus_minus
  25.   | Lexer
  26.   | Grammar
  27.   | Binary_interface
  28.   | Obj
  29.   | Backend_specific of Ocaml_backends.t * backend_specific
  30.   | Text (* used by ocamldoc for text only documentation *)

  32. ‌let string_of_backend_specific = function
  33.   | Object -> "object"
  34.   | Library -> "library"
  35.   | Program -> "program"

  37. ‌let string_of_filetype = function
  38.   | Implementation -> "implementation"
  39.   | Interface -> "interface"
  40.   | C -> "C source file"
  41.   | C_minus_minus -> "C minus minus source file"
  42.   | Lexer -> "lexer"
  43.   | Grammar -> "grammar"
  44.   | Binary_interface -> "binary interface"
  45.   | Obj -> "object"
  46.   | Backend_specific (backend, filetype) ->
  47.     ((Ocaml_backends.string_of_backend backend) ^ " " ^
  48.       (string_of_backend_specific filetype))
  49.   | Text -> "text"

  51. ‌let extension_of_filetype = function
  52.   | Implementation -> "ml"
  53.   | Interface -> "mli"
  54.   | C -> "c"
  55.   | C_minus_minus -> "cmm"
  56.   | Lexer -> "mll"
  57.   | Grammar -> "mly"
  58.   | Binary_interface -> "cmi"
  59.   | Obj -> Ocamltest_config.objext
  60.   | Backend_specific (backend, filetype) ->
  61.     begin match (backend, filetype) with
  62.       | (Ocaml_backends.Native, Object) -> "cmx"
  63.       | (Ocaml_backends.Native, Library) -> "cmxa"
  64.       | (Ocaml_backends.Native, Program) -> "opt"
  65.       | (Ocaml_backends.Bytecode, Object) -> "cmo"
  66.       | (Ocaml_backends.Bytecode, Library) -> "cma"
  67.       | (Ocaml_backends.Bytecode, Program) -> "byte"
  68.     end
  69.   | Text -> "txt"

  71. ‌let filetype_of_extension = function
  72.   | "ml" -> Implementation
  73.   | "mli" -> Interface
  74.   | "c" -> C
  75.   | "cmm" -> C_minus_minus
  76.   | "mll" -> Lexer
  77.   | "mly" -> Grammar
  78.   | "cmi" -> Binary_interface
  79.   | "o" -> Obj
  80.   | "obj" -> Obj
  81.   | "cmx" -> Backend_specific (Ocaml_backends.Native, Object)
  82.   | "cmxa" -> Backend_specific (Ocaml_backends.Native, Library)
  83.   | "opt" -> Backend_specific (Ocaml_backends.Native, Program)
  84.   | "cmo" -> Backend_specific (Ocaml_backends.Bytecode, Object)
  85.   | "cma" -> Backend_specific (Ocaml_backends.Bytecode, Library)
  86.   | "byte" -> Backend_specific (Ocaml_backends.Bytecode, Program)
  87.   | "txt" -> Text
  88.   | _ as e -> Printf.eprintf "Unknown file extension %s\n%!" e; exit 2

  90. ‌let split_filename name =
  91.   let l = String.length name in
  92.   let is_dir_sep name i = name.[i] = Filename.dir_sep.[0] in
  93.   let rec search_dot i =
  94.     if i < 0 || is_dir_sep name i then (name, "")
  95.     else if name.[i] = '.' then
  96.       let basename = String.sub name 0 i in
  97.       let extension = String.sub name (i+1) (l-i-1) in
  98.       (basename, extension)
  99.     else search_dot (i - 1) in
  100.   search_dot (l - 1)

  102. ‌let filetype filename =
  103.   let (basename, extension) = split_filename filename in
  104.   (basename, filetype_of_extension extension)

  106. ‌let make_filename (basename, filetype) =
  107.   let extension = extension_of_filetype filetype in
  108.   basename ^ "." ^ extension

  110. ‌let action_of_filetype = function
  111.   | Implementation -> "Compiling implementation"
  112.   | Interface -> "Compiling interface"
  113.   | C -> "Compiling C source file"
  114.   | C_minus_minus -> "Processing C-- file"
  115.   | Lexer -> "Generating lexer"
  116.   | Grammar -> "Generating parser"
  117.   | filetype -> ("nothing to do for " ^ (string_of_filetype filetype))
